SEARCH
Module pipeline
Package tcpassos.pipeline

Interface BranchedPipeline<BEGIN,END>

Type Parameters:
BEGIN - the type of the input to the pipeline
END - the type of the output from the pipeline
All Superinterfaces:
BasePipeline<BEGIN,List<END>>, MergeablePipeline<BEGIN,List<END>,Pipeline<BEGIN,END>,END>
public interface BranchedPipeline<BEGIN,END> extends MergeablePipeline<BEGIN,List<END>,Pipeline<BEGIN,END>,END>
Represents a branched pipeline in the Java Pipeline API. A branched pipeline takes an input of type BEGIN and produces a list of outputs of type END. It extends the MergablePipeline interface and provides additional functionality for merging the branches.

      <NEW_END> BranchedPipeline<BEGIN,NEW_END> connect(Pipeline<? super END,NEW_END> next)
      Connects the current pipeline with the specified next pipeline.
      Specified by:
      connect in interface MergeablePipeline<BEGIN,List<END>,Pipeline<BEGIN,END>,END>
      Type Parameters:
      NEW_END - The type of the end result of the next pipeline.
      Parameters:
      next - The next pipeline to connect.
      Returns:
